name: Secure the Files
description:
Press SPACE to interact with the PC or the generator. Click on the pill to take medicine. Keep your anxiety levels as low as you can. Locate a file, then type the code into the PC to secure it. Secure all 20 remaining files. Some other keys can be used on the keyboard to navigate.

There are 3 endings to collect.

Credits:

Game by me, code by me, music by Fesliyan Studios, sound effects by me and Fesliyan Studios, graphics by me.
